responses.content: ```yaml leads: - headline: Open Redirect in GET Shim Callback analysis: | The GET shim callback endpoint at `/duo-universal/callback` does not properly validate the `actionUrl` parameter before redirecting the user. An attacker could potentially exploit this to redirect users to a malicious website. cwe: CWE-601 function_names: - get filenames: - src/main/java/com/instipod/duouniversal/getshim/GetShimProvider.java classification: slightly promising ```

leads.headline: Open Redirect in GET Shim Callback
leads.analysis: The GET shim callback endpoint at /duo-universal/callback does not properly validate the actionUrl parameter before redirecting the user. An attacker could potentially exploit this to redirect users to a malicious website.
